title: Coordinate Emergency Response Drill
description: A venue manager needs to plan and execute a fire evacuation drill at the stadium during the off-season.

tasks.description: Create a detailed plan for the drill, including the scenario, timeline, and staff roles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive drill plan document.

tasks.description: Notify all venue staff and local emergency services (fire department) of the upcoming drill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends out notifications to all relevant parties.

tasks.description: On the day of the drill, use the PA system to announce the start of the drill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent activates the public address system with the drill announcement.

tasks.description: Monitor the drill and log the time it takes to evacuate the venue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the results of the drill for a post-event review.
